mapper.insert: INSERT INTO qna values( seq_qna_unum.nextval, #{userUnum}, #{qnaTitle}, #{qnaContent}, #{qnaComment}, sysdate )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM product ORDER BY product_unum DESC
SELECT * FROM delivery ORDER BY delivery_regdate DESC
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE order_unum not in (SELECT order_unum FROM delivery) ORDER BY order_regdate DESC

SELECT * FROM qna q LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT qna_title res_title, qna_content res_content, qna_comment res_comment FROM qna) q2 ON q.qna_unum = q2.res_comment WHERE qna_comment IS NULL ORDER BY q.qna_regdate DESC
